about_the_game:
Get inspired with the impressively crafted Inspirational Music Pack Vol. 1!

This pack features 37 tracks in 3 different genres amazingly crafted by composer Jacob Bind. With high sound quality and skilled musicianship, this music will inspire your game to be the best it can be!

This pack contains:

  • 37 instrumental music tracks
  • Music for 3 different genres of games: Adventure, Modern, and Suspense/Horror
  • Epic themes with powerful and skilled musical composition
  • m4a and ogg formats included
  • Royalty free music to use in your commercial and non-commercial RPG Maker MV projects

Tracklist:

Adventure:

1 - Elfen Lied
2 - Elfen Lied Loop
3 - Infinite Realms loop
4 - Nations of War
5 - Nebula
6 - Never Surrender
7 - One Last Stand
8 - Rising Sun
9 - Sacred Places
10 - Twilight Zone
11 - Whenever

Modern:

1 - Abandoned World
2 - Abandoned World Loop
3 - Changed Plans
4 - Cubism
5 - Farest Frontier
6 - Hard Reset
7 - IDM
8 - Isolence
9 - Objective
10 - Over Those Mountains
11 - Residence of Evil
12 - Synth World
13 - Temple of the Lost

Suspense & Horror

1 - Abandoned
2 - Alone
3 - Bad Timing
4 - Behind the Mirror
5 - Devil Breathe
6 - Down There
7 - Harvest
8 - Link By Link
9 - Lost
10 - Lullaby
11 - Lurker
12 - Memorium
13 - Momentum
14 - Observation
15 - Raiser
16 - Shades

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

name: RPG Maker MV - Inspirational Vol. 1

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy RPG Maker MV - Inspirational Vol. 1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

short_description: This pack features 37 tracks in 3 different genres, amazingly crafted by composer Jacob Bind to fuel your inspiration.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Simplified Chinese
